Text: We pirates in the right mind can always count on you C-Joe. Thank you for your prompt attention to the detail in the matter of the Civil Wars. Your flag I look for the first when in search of booty.

Omg i could KISS you man!!!!!!!
I typed in "The Civil Wars" and NADA came up!...........i was about to boo-hoo until i thought to try "Barton Hollow"!!

Reallyyyyyyy glad i did, i LOVE their latest single - it's awesome and their voices are FANTASTIC, so i'm very glad i get to listen to the full album!!! *huge thank yous !*
I registered so I could comment and say thank you! great album, great artists, thanks again.
Thanks so much!!! I'm sure I will be buying this CD eventually but I so appreciate being able to download it first! Cheers!
